Description:
Immaculate, Elegant & Perfectly Placed
Inspection by Appointment Only
Immaculately presented this charming double-storey home offers the ultimate in elegant and practical family living. Polished to perfection, it showcases open plan kitchen, meals and living, formal lounge and dining, and a superb alfresco entertaining area perfect for social gatherings. Light-filled and luxuriant, its’ comfortable aesthetic is further enhanced by its’ five bedrooms and three bathrooms plus retreat ideally zoned for flexibility and privacy. Set in a brilliant location and impeccably finished with paved and landscaped yards, it presents a truly tranquil setting. Also features:
*Brand new kitchen; Low maintenance yards
*WIRs & BIRs; Double shower ensuite; Security system
*GDH & EVAP AC; Solar panels (2kw inverter)
*Remote DLUG; Water tank; Ample storage space
*Moments to Croydon Hills Primary & Luther College
*Close to Yarrunga Reserve & McAdam Square

Description:
Kick-Start Your Future
First Homebuyers, Investors or Renovators, secure your entry into the market now with this superbly sited BV home. Set on a corner block of about 638 sqm., it's less than 500 metres from Yarra Valley Grammar, shops and bus, and is ripe to modernise and capitalise. This home is one of the first display homes in the Croydon Hills Estate. Colonial-style windows, a verandah and a lovely landscaped garden create smart street appeal. The sun-kissed interior is easy to live in or rent out now, and you can update it and add your own touches over time if you wish. Discover a practical layout featuring two separate living areas, for easy family living. A spacious lounge/dining room invites relaxation, while the large family/meals room has a ceiling fan and doors opening to the deck. You'll have views of the backyard from the original kitchen, which is fitted with a Chef oven and plenty of cupboard space. Three good-sized bedrooms (2 with BIRs, master with air-conditioning) are serviced by a tidy bathroom and separate toilet. Outdoors you'll be able to entertain or enjoy the peaceful, private setting on the covered entertainer's deck. It overlooks a secure low-maintenance garden for children to play. This feel-good home is complemented by extras: gas ducted heating, external blinds (rear and side) and double lock-up garage. When you consider the highly coveted family neighbourhood, close to Luther College, Good Shepherd Lutheran Primary, McAdam Square shops, transport, reserves, Eastland and EastLink, you'll know this is too good to miss!
Jo Parker : 0438 905 957

Ideally proportioned, it features two inviting and spacious living areas and three bedrooms filled with natural light perfect for a practical lifestyle. It includes:
*Low maintenance domains & yard
*Polished floorboards; WIR & BIRs

*Moments to Yarrunga Reserve, buses & shops

Description:
Impeccable & Stylish in Premium Location!
Perched in a leafy no-thru road within sought-after Croydon Hills, this impeccable residence is beautifully presented and enriched with quality appointments throughout.
As soon as you enter, your attention will be drawn to the soaring ceilings, soothing colour scheme and air of sophistication. The elegant lounge and dining is a resplendent, light-filled space for formal entertaining whilst the second living zone incorporates a casual family area and well-equipped kitchen featuring; gas hot plates, electric oven, dishwasher and abundant cupboard space.
Flowing outside through a glass door, you'll be greeted by a covered entertaining area, where you'll spend your weekends relaxing, soaking up the lovely green garden in the privacy of your maintenance-free backyard, leaving you with more time to yourself.
The master features a full en-suite and walk-in robe; furthermore, the design of the home offers parents distance from the kids' zone, entailing two huge bedrooms adorned with built-in robes and serviced by a well-maintained bathroom with separate bath and shower.
This highly-desirable residence features an array of inclusions, listing as; gas ducted heating, air-conditioning (x2), ceiling fans, awnings, shed and remote double garage with rear glazing's.
The location is perfect for the busy family with all the local amenities at your fingertips; Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College (behind), Yarra Valley Grammar School, transport and reserves. Given the premium location and postcard-perfect home, a prompt inspection is highly recommended.
David Jennings : 0414 588 823

Description:
Family Friendly Entertaining
Peacefully positioned in the bowl of the court, this generous family home presents an idyllic setting. Just metres from the billabong from which the street draws its name, it offers a serene atmosphere and an exceptional venue for entertaining and everyday living. Equipped with 3 spacious living zones and both covered and poolside alfresco spaces, there are few events to which this home can’t cater. It features:
*Formal & casual living, formal lounge with OFP
*4 sizable bedrooms, main with WIR & ensuite
*Contemporary kitchen with S-S appls
*Spacious covered patio & pool with deck
*Dbl Carport, covered storage & shed, Water tank
*Ducted heating & cooling
*Quite area close to shops & quality schools

Description:
Impressive in Every Way
** SOLD **
From the three living areas to the stunning outdoor entertaining and landscaped gardens, this beautiful split-level retreat offers you an impressive family lifestyle. It's set in a serene bowl-of-court location, and boasts a spacious flowing design, enhanced by streams of natural light and modern dcor. Enjoy 4 bedrooms (BIRs, ceiling fans), and a family bathroom. Parents have a large master suite, featuring WIR, ensuite and deck access; ideal for weekend breakfasts. Discover an up-to-the-minute gourmet kitchen showcasing s/s 900mm oven, dishwasher and glass splashbacks. The big rumpus room invites relaxation with its wood fire heater, French doors and striking angled ceilings, while the stylish lounge/dining room, and the bright family/meals room give you added practicality. A huge covered alfresco area with bistro blinds, outdoor kitchen and BBQ is the ultimate all-seasons' entertainer.You can soak up the glorious treed views from the spacious, elevated deck.Matched by exquisite, private landscaped gardens for children to play; ducted heating, split system cooling, shed, under-house workshop/storage and double carport. Close to private/gov't schools, transport, shops, reserves and EastLink. A dream come true! Call Sharyn de Vries Ray White Croydon 0401031802.

Description:
Priced to sell! Going, going....
First home buyers, retirees and investors will love this neat as a pin three bedroom brick veneer home. Better than a townhouse and NO owners corporate fees! Great Neighbors, a secure court location all within walking distance to schools, shops and transport. Move in today!
Here are some additional reasons to love this property:
- Polished floor boards
- Private & secure yard for entertaining, kids and/or pets
- Abundant off street parking
- 3 great sized bedrooms c/w built in BIRs
- Gas heating, ducted evaporative A/C
- Close to public transport, schools and shops
- Gas powered spacious Kitchen
- Great Views
- Priced to walk out the door!
Come to the open for inspection and then register your interest for your opportunity to secure this great home! Be quick!
Please call John Seamon on 0413 218 934
Multisell is a unique commission share system that allows sellers and buyers to save money & safely interact with the agent/s they prefer.

Description:
Put this home at the top of your Christmas List!
Give your family something to celebrate this Christmas by unwrapping a neatly packaged parcel - a large four bedroom home, situated on a private allotment of 762 sqm approx.
Nestled in a popular pocket with convenient access to public/private schools and parkland, this classic one owner home blends itself well to a modern facelift to accommodate a growing family.
The family focused floor plan includes an open plan lounge/dining, central kitchen with gas cooking and large meals area flows to the rear rumpus/games room.
The bedrooms are generous in size and zoned for convenience including the main bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe.
Completing the package is the large private backyard, timber deck ideal for entertaining and garage.
Call for an inspection today!

Description:
Your Family Oasis Awaits
Designed to inspire your senses, this well-maintained home is the epitome of quality workmanship that has stood the test of time. Featuring a sparkling in-ground pool (solar heated), this residence is framed by lush green gardens and palm trees, giving the sense that you've been whisked to a secluded resort.
There is plenty of room to spread your wings from the formal L-shaped lounge/dining with gas log fire, to the spacious family area serviced by a well-equipped kitchen comprising; electric wall oven, gas cook top, large walk-in pantry, dishwasher and breakfast bar.
The home has been designed to handle everyday living as well as larger gatherings with the family area spilling out to a covered outdoor entertaining zone with provision for a built-in barbeque and overlooks the manicured gardens - a truly magical setting.
Also, in keeping with the quality throughout the home, the master bedroom comprises a large walk-in robe and full en-suite, while the additional robed bedrooms share a modern bathroom with luxurious spa.
This impeccable home is rich with appointments to make life more comfortable with inclusions listing as; evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, double linen closet, new carpet, floating timber floor, awnings, pet run, powered shed, covered sandpit, oversized double garage with rear roller door, trailer parking and secure yard for children and pets.
Set on a 709m2 (approx) allotment within a highly sought-after pocket of Croydon Hills, the location is perfect for the growing family with Luther College and Croydon Hills Primary School within close walking distance, as well as McAdam Square, public transport and Yarrunga Reserve nearby. Escape to the idyllic surrounds of your own private oasis.
David Jennings : 0414 588 823

Description:
Brilliant Space, Presentation & Location
With its beautiful presentation, spacious layout and brilliant outdoor area, this high-set one owner brick veneer family retreat will attract Young Families, Investors or First Homebuyers. Set in a top location on approx 870 sqm., you're just a short walk from Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Croydon Hills Primary, transport and shops. Treed views and pristine gardens create appeal, while the light, modern interior is decorated for easy living and boasts 4 spacious bedrooms (3 robed) and a family bathroom. Parents have a private master with WIR and ensuite. Family life will be a breeze with two zoned living areas and a huge smart open plan kitchen fitted with quality appliances and excellent storage. The large lounge/dining room is a feel-good space, and the family/meals room has access to a stunning covered entertainer's deck with lighting; ideal for all-seasons' entertaining. You'll also appreciate a paved BBQ area, and a large secure landscaped garden with a variety of fruit trees, for children to play. Extras: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, under-house storage, under-deck storage; off street parking for trailer/car and remote double lock-up garage (space for a workshop). Close to Eastland and EastLink. Don't miss it!

Description:
PERFECT FAMILY FRIENDLY HOME
In a quiet court is this substantial Darnley built double storey home. The home offers plenty of living including a large timber kitchen adjoining the family room, separate dining and lounge room as well as the large rumpus. Four bedrooms all with wardrobes; master suite with dressing room and ensuite, and walk in robe. There is plenty of room for the extended family, with option to use the rumpus room and powder room as a suite, or even an ideal work from home option. In an enviable location close to amenities, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Croydon Hills Primary School this is the perfect family friendly home.

Description:
Parkland Serenity
Magnificent views across abutting sprawling parklands filled with birdlife paints a picture perfect setting for life in this uplifting modern home. Feng Shui principals were adapted in the home's design to create light-filled spaces that exude a real sense of calm with verdant outlook from every room and a fantastic outdoor environment in which to relax or entertain. A flowing interior introduces the separate lounge, with a big feature window framing the private front courtyard garden, leading to the bright family/meals area and modern stainless steel kitchen, spilling to a huge entertaining deck, overlooking large drought-resistant rear garden with water-cascading fishpond, lush parklands & walkways. Three bedrooms share the stylish bathroom and you'll find ducted heating, evaporate cooling and remote control double garage included. As serene as they come, this fabulous lifestyle property has Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, McAdams Square shops & cafs and transport within close proximity.

Description:
Imagine a Beautiful Family Lifestyle
From the three living areas and superb treed views, to the exquisite landscaped gardens, this stylishly rendered 2-storey family sanctuary will impress. Set in an exclusive court on 963 sqm. approx, it's enhanced by a semi-circular driveway; with off street parking for 5 cars. A striking entrance with a soaring ceiling makes a statement, while 4 bedrooms (3 robed, ceiling fans), a family bathroom and powder room will make life easy. The private master suite has WIR and deluxe spa bath ensuite (granite tiles) on lower level. Discover a gourmet kitchen/meals area showcasing a garden window and new appliances, including 1.5 s/s ovens and convection microwave. Relax in the large family room or soak up the views in the big formal lounge/dining room. An upstairs retreat creates added flexibility for the family/children. Entertain on the merbau deck, as the children play in the gorgeous landscaped garden. Plus quality window furnishings (screening blinds at front) and extras: internal access x-large remote double lined garage with workshop and storage; ducted heating; evaporative cooling; split system cooling; ducted vacuum and electronic drip watering system. Opposite Candlebark Walk; close to kinder, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Primary schools and transport. Act now!

Description:
An Elegant Rose
This elegant residence will welcome you with its beautiful rose garden, manicured lawns and weeping blossom, with sweet aromas to inspire your every day. Filled with style and class, the French windows and full-length verandah add street appeal and upon entering, the theme continues with decorative cornices and a beautiful L-shaped lounge/dining with large mirrors. The well-equipped kitchen will take care of your family's needs comprising gas hot plates, electric wall oven, dishwasher and adjacent tiled meals area for everyday dining. Cascading out from there, you'll discover a covered outdoor entertaining area with built-in BBQ and a private, secure yard for children and pets.
The master bedroom features a walk-in robe (his/hers style) and luxurious full en-suite blessed by a large window, inviting the luscious green garden inside - creating an atmosphere of indulgence as you relish long, hot showers in pure tranquillity and privacy. The additional bedrooms incorporate built-in robes and share a light-filled bathroom with separate bath and shower.
Inclusions to add to your lifestyle of convenience list as; gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, shed, remote single garage with rear roller door and fruit trees.The location is perfect for the busy family with all the local amenities at your fingertips; Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College (behind), Yarra Valley Grammar School, Good Shepherd Primary School, transport and reserves. Come and drink from the well of fine living!
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
Newly Renovated, Near Perfection
Beautifully renovated and nestled in a peaceful locale, this delightful home presents a unique opportunity for a variety of buyers. With domains ideally proportioned to suit first home buyers, downsizers or investors, its open plan living and radiant spaces present both comfort and practicality. Offering low-maintenance, up to date living, it features:
*Generous living space enhanced by new PFB
*Spectacular entertainers’ deck & sizeable yard
*Renovated kitchen complete with new s-s appls
*Fresh paint & new carpet; new bathroom vanity
*New GDH, 2x A/C, 2x Shed, WIR
*Leafy locale close to top schools, shops & buses

Description:
Delivering A Family Lifestyle
SOLD BY TIM LONGMORE 0433 304 805, AND MATTHEW SCAFIDI 0433 795 006, NOEL JONES BLACKBURN. Here it is! A genuine 4 bedroom family home that delivers both inside and out! With a winning combination of natural light, generous interior proportions including 3 living areas ideal for parents and children alike plus a child friendly garden. The inviting floor plan offers a spacious living room with a r/cycle split system air conditioner, rumpus or future theatre room and light-filled kitchen, family and dining area. With new fitted robes to all bedrooms including brand new contemporary WIR and en suite to master wrapped in porcelain tiles plus a family bathroom. Extras include gas ducted heating, Tasmanian Oak polished floors, new carpets throughout, S/S appliances, ceiling fans, remote double garage with rear roller door and internal access plus a powered large storage shed/workshop. Positioned in the popular Croydon Hills area, this home has amazing street presence. Walk to Luther, Good Shepherd, Yarra Valley Grammar, Croydon Hills Primary and McAdam Square. Near Rudolf Steiner school, Eastland Shopping Centre, public transport and convenient to Eastlink. Don't miss out on this rare Croydon Hills opportunity!
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS
PLEASE NOTE: Open for Inspection Times and Property Availability is subject to change or cancellation without notice. Melway Ref 36F11

Description:
A Lifestyle of Serenity
Poised in the bowl of a prestigious court, there is good reason this is a tightly-held pocket of Croydon Hills. Providing a lifestyle that combines pure comfort with practical living, this stylish home, over two levels, has been designed to capture the spectacular views of rolling green hills from almost every window; even the luxurious main bathroom where you'll relax in the spa and enjoy absolute serenity.
Multiple living areas will suit families from toddlers to teens, featuring; spacious lounge with Coonara providing an ambiance of warmth for treasured moments with family and friends, a downstairs rumpus/teen retreat with polished boards and wet bar, plus a separate meals zone serviced by a highly-functional kitchen comprising; electric oven, gas hotplates, dishwasher, much-needed cupboard space and tiled for easy maintenance. Cascading outside through a glass door, the covered decking wraps around the back of the home, showcasing every possible aspect of the beautiful surrounds - this is not just a home, but a way of life.
Three robed bedrooms offer a separate section for restful retreat from daily activities, including the master bedroom with full en-suite.
Other benefits to tantalise your senses are; gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double carport, storage, meticulously landscaped gardens and multiple fruit trees including; apricot, lemon, peach, lime, pear, apple, orange, mandarin and more.
Situated in a private and friendly neighbourhood, you'll enjoy close proximity to great schools, shops, parks, reserves and transport. The first step to realising your dream starts with an inspection!
James Brougham : 0412 620 498
